climbs.name: Hot Dog in a Hallway
climbs.fa: Tom Osborn, Ryan Turner, Byron Ingels

content.description: This route is on the west side of the formation and climbs the easy slab cracks and chimney to a big ledge with one bolt backed up by small cams for anchor for pitch one.  The second pitch is "the hallway" and is a short chimney/tunnel to the top of the formation rap anchors are in one of the large bath tub like features to the west
content.protection: single set of nuts and small cams
content.location: West side of the clam obvious "easiest line of passage to the top"

content.description: This is the first formation you see on the left hand side of the road. It has all styles of climbing on good solid granite and dikes.
